decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (PL/PP/2520 - 05, dated 05/2014, received 17/06/2014; PL/PP/2520 - 08 Rev A, dated 28.07.2014, PL/PP/2520 - 4 Rev A, dated 28.07.2014, PL/PP/2520 - 06, dated 28.07.2014, received 28/07/2014) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extensions hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

Condition : 4 - No additional windows or other glazed openings shall be formed in the side walls of the extensions hereby approved and no additional doors inserted in the building without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 5 - The roof area of the extension hereby permitted shall not be used as a balcony, roof garden or similar amenity area without the grant of further specific permission from the Local Planning Authority.
description: Erection of a part single part two storey side and rear extensions and rear roof extension with three roof windows
